page.title: 16A DAY AT HOME IN SAMLESBURY
page.content: I get up at 6.30 to help my dad clean out the pigs, feed the calves and fetch in the cows for milking. Then I have my breakfast of toast and eggs. I take our dogs a walk next and play with Tess the puppy.Sometimes I play on my bike or help my mum in the greenhouses which is boring. Sometimes I play with my cousin before dinner or sometimes I ride on my horse, Jubilee. After dinner I play football or cricket with my dad and Meg the dog. Then I feed all the dogs,Tess, Meg and Lady but Lady is a bit greedy. All the dogs are black and white. After that I help in the greenhouses again and then have another play. Then it is doing up time when we scrape the pigs off, fetch the cows in and milk them and feed the calves. After I have had my tea I put Tess, the pup, to bed and watch television for a while before I go to bed myself. Duncan.
